ui

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    This wetlands program facilitates the management of information related to said wetlands.
    Since:
    april 2022

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Main() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int displayMenu()
      This method displays the possible menu options for the user to choose from.
      void findSpecieInWetLands()
      This method allows to see if the name of a certain species exists in any of the existing wetlands
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void menuExecution(int option)
      This method executes the option chosen by the user on the display menu method
      void numMaintenancesInYear()
      This method allows showing on the screen all the maintenance carried out in the year that the user enters in all the wetlands.
      void registerEvent()
      This method allows registering a new event, verifying that the name of the wetland to which the event is going to be entered already exists, that the date entered is a valid one and that the data entered is under the conditions that the system requests from the user.
      void registerSpecie()
      This method allows registering a new species, verifying that the name of the wetland to which the species is going to be entered already exists, that the name and scientific name of the species are unique in the wetland to be entered and that the data entered are under the conditions that the system asks the user
      void registerWetLand()
      This method allows you to register a new wetland, checking that the name of the wetland does not exist and that the data entered is under the conditions that the system requests from the user.
      void showAllWetLandInfo()
      This method allows displaying on the screen all the information of all the wetlands in the system, verifying first that there is at least 1 wetland
      void wetLandMaxNumWildLife()
      This method allows you to see the wetland or wetlands with the largest number of wildlife species, verifying that there is at least 1 wetland in the system.
      void wetLandMinNumFlora()
      This method allows you to see the wetland or wetlands with the least amount of flora species, verifying that there is at least 1 wetland in the system.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Main

        public Main()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • displayMenu

        public int displayMenu()
        This method displays the possible menu options for the user to choose from.
        Returns:
        the option chosen by the user represented by an integer

      • menuExecution

        public void menuExecution(int option)
        This method executes the option chosen by the user on the display menu method
        Parameters:
        option - initialized with values between 1 and 8 to execute some function of the program, 0 to exit, and any other value, since it is not valid, the menu will reappear

      • registerWetLand

        public void registerWetLand()
        This method allows you to register a new wetland, checking that the name of the wetland does not exist and that the data entered is under the conditions that the system requests from the user.

      • registerSpecie

        public void registerSpecie()
        This method allows registering a new species, verifying that the name of the wetland to which the species is going to be entered already exists, that the name and scientific name of the species are unique in the wetland to be entered and that the data entered are under the conditions that the system asks the user

      • registerEvent

        public void registerEvent()
        This method allows registering a new event, verifying that the name of the wetland to which the event is going to be entered already exists, that the date entered is a valid one and that the data entered is under the conditions that the system requests from the user.

      • showAllWetLandInfo

        public void showAllWetLandInfo()
        This method allows displaying on the screen all the information of all the wetlands in the system, verifying first that there is at least 1 wetland

      • numMaintenancesInYear

        public void numMaintenancesInYear()
        This method allows showing on the screen all the maintenance carried out in the year that the user enters in all the wetlands.

      • wetLandMinNumFlora

        public void wetLandMinNumFlora()
        This method allows you to see the wetland or wetlands with the least amount of flora species, verifying that there is at least 1 wetland in the system.

      • wetLandMaxNumWildLife

        public void wetLandMaxNumWildLife()
        This method allows you to see the wetland or wetlands with the largest number of wildlife species, verifying that there is at least 1 wetland in the system.

      • findSpecieInWetLands

        public void findSpecieInWetLands()
        This method allows to see if the name of a certain species exists in any of the existing wetlands
